mapper.select: select id "id", membertype "membertype", registersource "registersource", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", mobile "mobile", cardno "cardno", bank "bank", companyname "companyname", status "status", insertdate "insertdate", updatedate "updatedate", corname "corname", corcardtype "corcardtype", corcardno "corcardno", membername "membername" from cas.cas_register_info where id = #{id} for update

select id "id", membertype "membertype", registersource "registersource", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", mobile "mobile", cardno "cardno", bank "bank", companyname "companyname", status "status", insertdate "insertdate", updatedate "updatedate", corname "corname", corcardtype "corcardtype", corcardno "corcardno", membername "membername" from cas.cas_register_info where id = #{id}

select id "id", membertype "membertype", registersource "registersource", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", mobile "mobile", cardno "cardno", bank "bank", companyname "companyname", status "status", insertdate "insertdate", updatedate "updatedate", corname "corname", corcardtype "corcardtype", corcardno "corcardno", membername "membername" from cas.cas_register_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into cas.cas_register_info( id,membertype,registersource,certificatetype,certificateno, mobile,cardno,bank,companyname,status, insertdate,updatedate,corname,corcardtype,corcardno, membername ) values( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{membertype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{registersource, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{certificatetype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{certificateno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cardno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bank, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{companyname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{updatedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{corname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{corcardtype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{corcardno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{membername, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into cas.cas_register_info( id,membertype,registersource,certificatetype,certificateno, mobile,cardno,bank,companyname,status, insertdate,updatedate,corname,corcardtype,corcardno, membername ) values
( #{item.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.membertype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.registersource, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.certificatetype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.certificateno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.cardno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.bank, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.companyname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.insertdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.updatedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.corname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.corcardtype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.corcardno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.membername, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
